definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Park Ji-sung (1981-), South Korean former footballer, played for Manchester United (2005-2012)

sentences.english: That day the George Foreman grill was born.
sentences.chinese: 那天便是拳王智烤爐誕生的日子。

sentences.english: A think tank zone provides a space for casual discussion and access to resources.
sentences.chinese: 智庫區爲隨意討論和獲取資源提供了空間。

sentences.english: A wise believer understands the essence of Buddhism. Those who are superstitious misinterprets the virtue of religion.
sentences.chinese: 智信者深體佛法之精神，迷信者曲解宗教的美意。

sentences.english: Augus Partners is an international corporate advisory firm based in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 鰲智是一家位於北京的國際專業企業諮詢公司。

sentences.english: Savvy managers should treat each type differently, she argues.
sentences.chinese: 凱勒曼說明智的管理人員應當區別對待各類追隨者。

sentences.english: Thats true for hyacinths and homo sapiens, walruses and raz, which is a fish. A switch hitting fiSh.
sentences.chinese: 對於風信子，智人，海象和隆頭魚來說都是如此。

sentences.english: In Chi Gong therapy, Chi radiated by a Chi Gong master is called external Chi.
sentences.chinese: 在郗公療法，由郗共輻射主池被稱爲外部智。

sentences.english: A wise believer understands the essence of Buddhism, Those who are superstitious misinterpret the virtue of religion.
sentences.chinese: 智信者深體佛法之精神，迷信者曲解宗教之美意。

sentences.english: Having refuted the Wise Old Man's wrong ideas, the Foolish Old Man went on digging.
sentences.chinese: 愚公批駁了智叟的錯誤思想之後，就繼續挖山。

sentences.english: Students of Holy Trinity College presented their model and design.
sentences.chinese: 寶血會上智英文書院的同學介紹她們的設計模型。

sentences.english: However, the comments were capable of being misconstrued and so were unwise.
sentences.chinese: 可是，該言論可能引起誤導，誠屬不智。

sentences.english: However, what kind of color reproduction is correct, is usually a controversial agendum .
sentences.chinese: 然而什麼樣的色彩是對的，往往見人見智。

sentences.english: Disciples Detong and Zhi Xuan requested me to do calligraphy for the attached praises by disciples.
sentences.chinese: 弟子茶桶和智宣都要求我書寫附呈由弟子所寫的讚頌。

sentences.english: Win more in virtue than resourcefulness.
He believes that would be like removing the power system of an aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，這樣就像拆掉了飛機的動力系統一樣不智。

sentences.english: It was the key that he could not sure that the human beings have intellectual intuition.
sentences.chinese: 這其中的關鍵是康德不能肯定人有智的直覺。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
auspicious/propitious/good luck/felicity/euphoria/used for 旗, e.g. in 旗袍, long Chinese dress
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
